Academic Integration Â· IIT Chicago

Stay on top of IIT's academic calendar and key deadlines.

Illinois Institute of Technology's academic calendar sets the official dates for semester start and end, add/drop and withdrawal deadlines, university holidays, and final exams. This dashboard helps you line up your visa, course registration, travel, and personal plans with those key dates.

Use this page to combine IIT's official calendar with your own registration plan, advisor meetings, and study workflow.

For full details, always verify against the Registrar's official academic calendar.

Registration & course planning

Map your IIT academic calendar to actual courses, credit load, and registration windows so you don't miss enrollment deadlines.

Course Registration Guide

Step-by-step help for registering at Illinois Tech as an international student.

I am a
  1. 1

    Get your 6-digit registration PIN from your adviser

    At Illinois Tech, undergraduate students typically need a unique PIN from their academic adviser before registering.

    You will be assigned an adviser after you confirm enrollment; connect with them before registration opens.

  2. 2

    Complete math, writing, and other placement tests (if required)

    Certain courses are locked until your placement scores are on file with the Registrar and academic departments.

    Check your admitted-student checklist or onboarding portal for placement testing links.

  3. 3

    Plan your first-term schedule using degree planning tools

    Use your degree audit, academic bulletin, and sample plans to choose courses that satisfy IIT core and major requirements.

    You can mirror IITâ€™s recommended first-year sequence, then adjust with your adviser.

  4. 4

    Register through myIIT / registration system when your time ticket opens

    When registration opens for your group, log in to the registration system, enter your PIN, and add or adjust courses.

    Official registration dates and add/drop deadlines come from the Registrarâ€™s academic calendar.

Exact registration dates, time tickets, and rules come from the IIT Office of the Registrar and your academic department. This planner is a student-facing guide that you can later wire to live registration and holds via API.

In the future, connect this module to myIIT and your student information system to display real-time registration status.

Key academic dates snapshot

Use this widget to track term start/end, add/drop deadlines, withdrawal dates, and exam periods based on IIT's academic calendar.

IIT Academic Calendar

The main term for many new international arrivals. Classes usually begin in late August and end in mid-December.

Classes begin

Late August (see official calendar)

First day of full-semester classes for the fall term.

UGGradPhD

Last day to add/drop without record

Within first week of classes

Deadline to adjust your schedule without a W (withdrawal) on your transcript.

UGGrad

Graduate / PhD add/drop & enrollment lock

Early in the term

Graduate and PhD students finalize enrollment that can affect assistantships, funding, and full-time status.

GradPhD

Midterm period

Mid-October (approx.)

Time when many courses schedule midterm exams, projects, or progress checks.

UGGrad

Last day to withdraw from classes

Late October / early November

Final date to withdraw from a course with a W grade, if needed.

UGGradPhD

Thanksgiving recess

Late November

University holiday period â€” no classes, limited campus services.

UGGradPhD

Final exams

Early to mid-December

Official exam week(s) that conclude the fall semester.

UGGradPhD

These term groups and milestones are structured to mirror how Illinois Tech's academic calendar is organized (classes begin, add/drop, withdrawal, final exams). Exact dates vary by year and term â€” always confirm details on the official Registrar academic calendar, especially for immigration, billing, CPT/OPT, and graduation requirements.

This dashboard is designed to mirror IIT's official calendar. If any date seems unclear, cross-check with the IIT Registrar academic calendar.
